kb3.name: kb3_ship_classes
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_ship_classes` ( `scl_id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `scl_class` char(32) NOT NULL, `scl_value` bigint(4) NOT NULL default '0', `scl_points` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`scl_id`), UNIQUE KEY `scl_class` (`scl_class`) ) Type=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
